title: Green Center
description: An eco environmental store with a cafe attached that's non-veg but offers juices and a couple lacto-veg sandwiches. Store stocks fresh organic produce, gluten free mixes, recycled and green cleaning products, natural cosmetics and body care, clothing, and green gifts as well as a home improvement section.
streetAddress: 800 mts oeste de Forum 1, Autopista SJ-Caldera, Primera salida hacia Urbanización Ri­o Oro
